interpretation:
The "cold face" emoji represents a feeling of extreme coldness or detachment. It can signify a sense of emotional distance or a need for space. This card may indicate a time of isolation or a desire to withdraw from others. It can also suggest a need for self-care and prioritizing personal boundaries. 

In a reading, this card may suggest a need to take a step back from a situation or relationship to gain clarity and perspective. It can also indicate a need to prioritize self-care and focus on one's own needs and well-being. On the flip side, it can suggest a need to break out of a state of emotional detachment and reconnect with others on a deeper level.
